list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: measuring a small distance from end to end.
lasting or taking a small amount of time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: visiting London for a short break
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tham quan London để nghỉ ngắn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a vowel) categorized as short with regard to quality and length (e.g. in standard British English the vowel /ʊ/ in good is short as distinct from the long vowel /uː/ in food ).

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was often sharp and rather short with her
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy thường sắc nét và khá ngắn với cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of odds or a chance) reflecting or representing a high level of probability.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they have been backed at short odds to win thousands of pounds
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ đã được hỗ trợ trong các tỷ lệ cược ngắn để giành được hàng ngàn bảng Anh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of pastry) containing a high proportion of fat to flour and therefore crumbly.
(chiefly in sport) at, to, or over a relatively small distance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you go deep and you go short
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bạn đi sâu và bạn đi ngắn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a short film as opposed to a feature film.
a short sound such as a short signal in Morse code or a short vowel or syllable.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her call was two longs and a short
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cuộc gọi của cô ấy là hai dài và một ngắn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mixture of bran and coarse flour.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the electrical circuit had shorted out

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sell (stocks or other securities or commodities) in advance of acquiring them, with the aim of making a profit when the price falls.
